message.name: ERR_HEARINGCASE_FV_EFFECTIVEDATE
message.locale: An effective date must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGCASE_FV_RECEIVEDDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: A date received must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGCASE_FV_CASE
message.locale: An appeal must be associated with a case.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGCASE_FV_INTEGRATEDCASE
message.locale: An appeal cannot be created for an integrated case.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGCASE_FV_ACTIVE
message.locale: An appeal is already associated with this case.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGCASE_FV_CASEPARTICIPANT
message.locale: An appeal must be associated with a registered participant.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGCASE_FV_APPELLANT
message.locale: An appellant must be associated with the original case.

message.name: INF_DEADLINE_REASON
message.locale: The appeal on this case must be decided, and any decision implemented.

message.name: INF_BENEFIT_CONTINUE_YES
message.locale: A request has been made to continue benefits for this case while the appeal is in progress. Please review the case and reinstate benefits if appropriate.

message.name: INF_BENEFIT_CONTINUE_NO
message.locale: The customer does not wish to continue benefits while the appeal is in progress. Please review the case and update if appropriate.

message.name: INF_HEARINGCASE_DECISION
message.locale: No decision has been made yet.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGCASE_FV_ACTIVEPARTICIPANT
message.locale: A participant must be associated with the case.
